original_text: Then Nebuchadnezzar was filled with fury, and the expression of his face was changed against Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego. He ordered the furnace heated seven times more than it was usually heated.
korean_text: 느부갓네살이 분이 가득하여 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 향하여 얼굴빛을 바꾸고 명령하여 이르되 그 풀무불을 뜨겁게 하기를 평소보다 칠 배나 뜨겁게 하라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Nebuchadnezzar was filled with fury
and the expression of his face was changed
seven times more than it was usually heated
sentences.korean_translation: 보통 때보다 일곱 배 더 뜨겁게
